name: loot.worlds
description:
One ship, one super size gun and much, much more loot! Embark in this clicker adventure to loot as many things as possible from any planet in existence. Loot until you achieve every achievement. Each one of those will give you a special surprise. And remember, no loot is left behind!

Game by luisquid/baitwastaken

Music by https://www.purple-planet.com.

Sound Effects by https://soundslikegeorge.itch.io/human-interface

Planets taken from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/low-poly-ultimate-pack-54733
